input: Bob is green. Dave is big. Dave is blue. Dave is green. Dave is kind. Dave is nice. Dave is red. Fiona is nice. Harry is kind. Harry is red. If something is green then it is blue. All blue things are cold. Cold, red things are green. If Harry is kind and Harry is blue then Harry is nice. Nice things are kind. Blue, big things are red. If something is green then it is big. If something is kind and red then it is cold. If something is kind then it is red. Question: Fiona is blue.?
output:
universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Bob : obj
constant Dave : obj
constant Fiona : obj
constant Harry : obj

constant Green : obj → Prop
constant Big : obj → Prop
constant Blue : obj → Prop
constant Kind : obj → Prop
constant Nice : obj → Prop
constant Red : obj → Prop
constant Cold : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : Green Bob
axiom T2 : Big Dave
axiom T3 : Blue Dave
axiom T4 : Green Dave
axiom T5 : Kind Dave
axiom T6 : Nice Dave
axiom T7 : Red Dave
axiom T8 : Nice Fiona
axiom T9 : Kind Harry
axiom T10 : Red Harry

axiom R1 : ∀ x : obj, Green x → Blue x
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, Blue x → Cold x
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Cold x ∧ Red x → Green x
axiom R4 : Kind Harry ∧ Blue Harry → Nice Harry
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Nice x → Kind x
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, Blue x ∧ Big x → Red x
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Green x → Big x
axiom R8 : ∀ x : obj, Kind x ∧ Red x → Cold x
axiom R9 : ∀ x : obj, Kind x → Red x

theorem fiona_is_blue : Blue Fiona :=
begin
  apply R1,
  apply R3,
  split,
  apply R2,
  apply R1,
  apply R3,
  split,
  apply R8,
  split,
  apply R5,
  exact T8,
  apply R9,
  apply R5,
  exact T8,
  apply R9,
  apply R5,
  exact T8,
end

-- The answer is True
